name: That other me
description:
LOADING MAY TAKE A WHILE IN LOW-END PCs.

In this game, you play as a double persona character, in the first phase you'll be only able to move right, and only collect gold coins, and get damaged by dark spikes, on the other phase it's the opposite.

The phases will switch if you reach the swtich flag, or the switch timer runs out.

collect all the coins to procceed to the next level.

CONTROLS:

directional keys : move

space : jump
